scripts.build:wrapper: npm run build && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const srcDir = './src-js'; const distDir = './pkg'; if (!fs.existsSync(distDir)) fs.mkdirSync(distDir, { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync(srcDir).forEach(file => { if (file.endsWith('.js')) { const srcPath = path.join(srcDir, file); const distPath = path.join(distDir, file); const content = fs.readFileSync(srcPath, 'utf8'); const relativePath = file === 'index.js' ? './dash_wasm_sdk.js' : `./${file}`; const updatedContent = content.replace(/from '\.\./pkg/dash_wasm_sdk\.js'/g, \`from '${relativePath}'\`); fs.writeFileSync(distPath, updatedContent); } });"
scripts.test: echo 'Tests run from web interface at index.html'
